locations.name: Athens
locations.description: The historic capital of Greece, starting point of the tour, featuring ancient landmarks like the Acropolis and the charming Plaka district.

locations.name: Milos
locations.description: A volcanic island known for unique beaches like Sarakiniko, dramatic cliffs, sea caves, and colourful fishing villages ('syrmata'). Coordinates point near Adamantas, the main port.

locations.name: Sifnos
locations.description: An island celebrated for its cuisine, pottery, whitewashed villages, and ancient walking paths. Coordinates point near Apollonia, the capital.

locations.name: Naxos
locations.description: The largest Cycladic island, offering a mix of history (Portara), fertile inland villages, olive groves, and extensive sandy beaches. Coordinates point near Naxos Town (Chora).
